snippet: Stacy Lewis won the ShopRite L.P.G.A. Classic on Sunday to take the top world ranking from Inbee Park, finishing with a four-under-par 67 for a six-stroke victory.
abstract: Stacey Lewis wins ShopRite LPGA Classic, taking top world ranking from Inbee Park; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Stacy Lewis won the ShopRite L.P.G.A. Classic on Sunday to take the top world ranking from Inbee Park, finishing with a four-under-par 67 for a six-stroke victory.

headline.main: Stacy Lewis Ousts Inbee Park as World No. 1
